properties.address: 1 kintyre place tarbert PA29 6UL, Tarbert, Argyll PA29 6UL
properties.description: Somewhere safe and warm to meet up , have warm food, teas coffees, snacks. Play games, activities, chat, bring your own activities. Access to charging phones etc and to heating food . Advice and assistance around warmth and food poverty , isolation and wellbeing.
properties.title: The pantry warm Wednesdays

properties.address: 1 Kintyre Place, Tarbert, PA29 6YE the venue is right next to posties sorting office on the right
properties.description: Warm Wednesdays from the 4th of December right through until March . 12pm till 2pm and all welcome for hot soup and snacks, teas, coffees There will be games, arts, as well as a chance to charge any tech and access to warmth and food support.
properties.title: Tarbert Pantry
